name: Garbage Bird 1.2.02
description:
An UP-TO-DATE version of the Android NLSS fan game Garbage Bird!

Garbage Bird | Ver 1.2.02 | Hotfix

Bugs:
- A problem with the ini might have resulted in crashes, this has hoepfully been resolved!
- The garbage meter sometimes would not clear properly when all garbage has been cleaned, again I found what might have been causing the problem!
